name: Web Smartsheet
description: Smartsheet is an online project manager and collaborator. It helps to manage all kinds of projects in a company. Smartsheet UI is designed specially for those who frequently deal with Excel, it allows them to collaborate data directly in the spreadsheet.

en_US.description: Smartsheet is an online project manager and collaborator. It helps to manage all kinds of projects in a company. Smartsheet UI is designed specially for those who frequently deal with Excel, it allows them to collaborate data directly in the spreadsheet.
en_US.name: Web Smartsheet

zh_CN.description: Smartsheet是一款在线的项目管理和协作工具，它主要帮助管理公司的各种项目。Smartsheet的用户界面专为那些经常要和Excel表格打交道的人员设计，让他们可以直接在电子表格里进行数据的协作。
zh_CN.name: Smartsheet网页版
